segment.source: Group Policies that apply only to Windows 10 Enterprise and Education Editions (Windows 10)
segment.target: Group Policies that apply only to Windows 10 Enterprise and Education Editions (Windows 10)

segment.source: Use this topic to learn about Group Policy objects that apply only to Windows 10 Enterprise and Windows 10 Education.
segment.target: Use this topic to learn about Group Policy objects that apply only to Windows 10 Enterprise and Windows 10 Education.

segment.source: Group Policies that apply only to Windows 10 Enterprise and Education Editions
segment.target: Group Policies that apply only to Windows 10 Enterprise and Education Editions

segment.source: In Windows 10, version 1511, the following Group Policies apply only to Windows 10 Enterprise and Windows 10 Education.
segment.target: In Windows 10, version 1511, the following Group Policies apply only to Windows 10 Enterprise and Windows 10 Education.

segment.source: Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > Windows Components > Store > Turn off the Store application
segment.target: Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > Windows Components > Store > Turn off the Store application

segment.source: User Configuration > Administrative Templates > Windows Components > Store > Turn off the Store
segment.target: User Configuration > Administrative Templates > Windows Components > Store > Turn off the Store

segment.source: For more info, see Knowledge Base article# 3135657.
segment.target: For more info, see Knowledge Base article# 3135657.

segment.source: User Configuration\Administrative Templates\Start Menu and Taskbar
segment.target: User Configuration\Administrative Templates\Start Menu and Taskbar

segment.source: For more info, see Manage Windows 10 Start layout options and policies
segment.target: For more info, see Manage Windows 10 Start layout options and policies

segment.source: Force a specific default lock screen image
segment.target: Force a specific default lock screen image

segment.source: Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > Control Panel > Personalization
segment.target: Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > Control Panel > Personalization

segment.source: For more info, see Windows spotlight on the lock screen
